name: Xunit
help: xUnit.net is a free, open source, community-focused unit testing tool for the .NET Framework. Written by the original inventor of NUnit v2, xUnit.net is the latest technology for unit testing C#, F#, VB.NET and other .NET languages. xUnit.net works with ReSharper, CodeRush, TestDriven.NET and Xamarin. It is part of the .NET Foundation, and operates under their code of conduct. It is licensed under Apache 2 (an OSI approved license).

properties.name: TargetAssemblyWithConfigs
properties.help: Assemblies to test, and their related related configuration files (ending with .json or .config).

properties.name: NoLogo
properties.help: Do not show the copyright message.

properties.name: NoColor
properties.help: Do not output results with colors.

properties.name: FailSkips
properties.help: Convert skipped tests into failures.

properties.name: StopOnFail
properties.help: Stop on first test failure.

properties.name: Parallel
properties.help:
Set parallelization based on option:
  • none: turn off all parallelization
  • collections: only parallelize collections
  • assemblies: only parallelize assemblies
  • all: parallelize assemblies & collections

properties.name: MaxThreads
properties.help:
Maximum thread count for collection parallelization:
  • default: run with default (1 thread per CPU thread)
  • unlimited: run with unbounded thread count
  • (number): limit task thread pool size to 'count'

properties.name: AppDomainMode
properties.help:
AppDomain modes:
  • -ifavailable: choose based on library type
  • -required: force app domains on
  • -denied: force app domains off

properties.name: NoShadowCopying
properties.help: Do not shadow copy assemblies.

properties.name: Wait
properties.help: Wait for input after completion.

properties.name: Diagnostics
properties.help: Enable diagnostics messages for all test assemblies.

properties.name: Pause
properties.help: Pause before doing any work, to help attach a debugger.

properties.name: Debug
properties.help: Launch the debugger to debug the tests.

properties.name: Serialization
properties.help: Serialize all test cases (for diagnostic purposes only).

properties.name: Traits
properties.help: Only run tests with matching name/value traits.

properties.name: ExcludedTraits
properties.help: Do not run tests with matching name/value traits.

properties.name: Methods
properties.help: Run a given test method (can be fully specified or use a wildcard; i.e., 'MyNamespace.MyClass.MyTestMethod' or '*.MyTestMethod').

properties.name: Classes
properties.help: Run all methods in a given test class (should be fully specified; i.e., 'MyNamespace.MyClass').

properties.name: Namespaces
properties.help: Run all methods in a given namespace (i.e., 'MyNamespace.MySubNamespace').

properties.name: NoAutoReporters
properties.help: Do not allow reporters to be auto-enabled by environment for example, auto-detecting TeamCity or AppVeyor).

properties.name: Reporter
properties.help:
Reporters:
  • -appveyor: forces AppVeyor CI mode (normally auto-detected)
  • -json: show progress messages in JSON format
  • -quiet: do not show progress messages
  • -teamcity: forces TeamCity mode (normally auto-detected)
  • -verbose: show verbose progress messages

properties.name: ResultReports
properties.help:
Result formats:
  • -xml: output results to xUnit.net v2 XML file
  • -xmlv1: output results to xUnit.net v1 XML file
  • -nunit: output results to NUnit v2.5 XML file
  • -html: output results to HTML file
